trans-unit.source: Defines methods that ASP.NET server controls must implement to define ECMAScript (JavaScript) resources in AJAX-enabled applications.
trans-unit.target: 定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件为在启用 AJAX 的应用程序中定义 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 资源而必须实现的方法。

trans-unit.source: When implemented by a class, the methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> interface provide references to script libraries that define client components and script descriptors that represent instances of client types.
trans-unit.target: 由类，方法的实现时<xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl>接口提供对脚本库，定义客户端组件和脚本描述符的表示的客户端类型的实例的引用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this interface in custom server controls that will include script control functionality.
trans-unit.target: 将包括脚本控件功能的自定义服务器控件中实现此接口。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Adding Client Capabilities to a Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d365cbe-1bde-4cef-9fe7-2cd04d3cbdea).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[添加到 Web 服务器控件的客户端功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d365cbe-1bde-4cef-9fe7-2cd04d3cbdea)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of script descriptors that represent ECMAScript (JavaScript) client components.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 客户端组件的脚本描述符的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to define components, behaviors, or client controls from the Microsoft Ajax Library that the server control requires.
trans-unit.target: 实现此方法来定义组件、 行为或从 Microsoft Ajax 库服务器控件所需的客户端控件。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to pass declaratively specified parameters to Microsoft Ajax Library functions.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以将以声明方式指定的参数传递给 Microsoft Ajax 库函数。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must also implement the abstract <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，则必须实现抽象<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> objects that define script resources that the control requires.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于定义该控件所需的脚本资源的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to define custom script library dependencies that the server control requires, such as scripts in a Scripts folder of the current Web application, or resources in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 实现此方法可定义自定义脚本服务器控件所需，如当前 Web 应用程序的脚本文件夹中的脚本或程序集中的资源的库依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Scripts from the Microsoft Ajax Library do not have to be registered in this manner.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Ajax 库中的脚本不需要在这种方式中注册。
